exceptions.exn: Unable to unify "SeparationAlgebra ?M2113" with "forall m n m1 m2 : Prop, join m1 m2 m -> Krelation m n -> exists n1 n2 : Prop, join n1 n2 n /\\ Krelation m1 n1 /\\ Krelation m2 n2".

original: apply Build_SeparationAlgebra. - intros m1 m2 m H. inversion H. exists m2, m1. auto. - intros mx my mz mxy mxyz H1 H2. exists myz. split. + apply join_comm with (m1:=mx) (m2:=my) in H1. eauto. + apply join_assoc with (mx:=mx) (my:=my) (mz:=mz) (mxy:=mxy) (mxyz:=mxyz) in H1; eauto.
